title: MAC OSX 怎么搭建forge的环境，求助大佬
author: 化成小六
txt_content:
本帖最后由 化成小六 于 2017-8-1 19:17 编辑 

RT，
jdk和eclipse都下完了
 看到win下面都是输入dos命令，XOS怎么配置

————————————更新——————————————
知道XOS的命令了，是：

./gradlew setupDecompWorkspace


但是下载过程一直出现一个错误不知道怎么解决。


日志如下：


Download http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/or ... 1-natives-linux.jar[ant:javac] 警告: [options] 未与 -source 1.6 一起设置引导类路径[ant:javac] 1 个警告:downloadMcpTools:downloadClient:downloadServer:mergeJars FAILED
FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.
* What went wrong:Execution failed for task ':mergeJars'.> java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
* Try:Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output.
BUILD FAILED
